subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The four-time winner Ernie Els took a two-shot lead into the last day of the South African Open in Durban, after he and Retief Goosen, the country’s two biggest golf stars, rose into contention for the 100th national title.
snippet: The four-time winner Ernie Els took a two-shot lead into the last day of the South African Open in Durban, after he and Retief Goosen, the country’s two biggest golf stars, rose into contention for the 100th national title.
